title: Develop multi-factor authentication module
description: As a user, I want a multi-factor authentication module, so that my identity is securely verified using multiple factors.
attributes_and_rules: Multiple verification methods (passwords, OTPs, biometrics, email verification), session management, timeouts, password recovery.
acceptance_criteria: User is prompted to verify using multiple factors, session management ensures user gets logged out after timeout or inactivity, password recovery is available.
test_cases: Given a user attempts to log in, when they enter correct credentials and an OTP, then they should be granted access. Given a user is inactive for a specified time, when inactivity threshold is reached, then they should be logged out.

title: Ensure compliance with security standards
description: As a security officer, I want the authentication module to comply with banking-grade security standards, so that user data is securely protected.
attributes_and_rules: Compliance with banking-grade security standards, data encryption, protection against unauthorized access, and session hijacking.
acceptance_criteria: Module meets banking-grade security standards, data is encrypted, unauthorized access and session hijacking are prevented.
test_cases: Given data is transmitted, when it is intercepted, then it should be encrypted. Given a session is hijacked, when attempted access is made, then it should be prevented.

title: Create personalized user dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view relevant accounts, offers, and products tailored to me.
attributes_and_rules: Display financial summaries, pending requests, personalized recommendations, modular layout.
core_domain_objects: User dashboard, Financial account, Product offer
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays relevant account information, offers, and product recommendations.
test_cases: Given a user logs in, when the dashboard loads, then they should see personalized account information and offers. Given a user has pending requests, when displayed on the dashboard, then they should be visible.

title: Implement responsive design
description: As a user, I want a responsive interface, so that I have a consistent experience across all devices.
attributes_and_rules: Adaptive layouts for desktops, tablets, smartphones, accessible navigation, mobile-first optimization.
acceptance_criteria: Interface adjusts layout based on device screen size, maintains usability and design quality across devices.
test_cases: Given a user accesses the portal on mobile, when the layout is loaded, then it should adapt to screen size. Given a user accesses the portal on desktop, when the layout is loaded, then it should adapt to screen size.

epic_title: Online Account Opening and Service Requests
title: Enable online account opening and modifications
description: As a new customer, I want to open accounts online, so that I can conveniently set up my banking services.
attributes_and_rules: Guided workflows, pre-filled forms, document uploads, real-time eligibility validation.
acceptance_criteria: Users can complete online account opening, upload relevant documents, and validate eligibility in real-time.
test_cases: Given a user starts an account opening process, when they upload required documents, then they should proceed to the next step. Given a user fills in information, when eligibility is validated, then they should be informed in real-time.

title: Develop real-time notification module
description: As a user, I want real-time alerts, so that I can track the status of my requests.
attributes_and_rules: Send updates via email and messages, customizable message templates, privacy compliance.
acceptance_criteria: Notifications are sent in real-time, users can track request statuses, message templates are customizable.
test_cases: Given a user submits a request, when the status changes, then they should receive a real-time notification. Given a notification message is generated, when sent, then it should comply with privacy regulations.

title: Build interaction history feature
description: As a user, I want to view my interaction history, so that I can reference past activities and transactions.
attributes_and_rules: Record login attempts, document submissions, service requests, filtering by date, category, request type.
acceptance_criteria: Users can view complete interaction history, filter by relevant criteria.
test_cases: Given a user checks their history, when login attempts are listed, then they should be accurate. Given a user filters transactions, when selecting a date range, then results should match criteria.

title: Implement RBAC system
description: As an admin, I want to assign role-based access, so that users only have appropriate permissions.
attributes_and_rules: Map roles to privileges, role management, auditing, compliance enforcement.
acceptance_criteria: Roles define user access levels, admin interfaces allow role management, auditing is enabled.
test_cases: Given a new role is created, when assigned to a user, then privileges should match role. Given an audit, when performed, then access logs should be accurate.

title: Establish secure API connections with core banking
description: As a developer, I want to integrate core banking systems, so that data is synchronized in real-time.
attributes_and_rules: Secure API connections, backward compatibility, error handling, message queuing.
acceptance_criteria: Data is synchronized in real-time, API connections are secure, errors are handled gracefully.
test_cases: Given an API call, when data is fetched, then it should be up-to-date. Given an error occurs, when handled, then system should remain stable.

epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
title: Design dedicated database architecture
description: As a database administrator, I want an independent database, so that portal data is stored efficiently and performs well.
attributes_and_rules: Optimize query performance, indexing, caching, scheduled backups, data replication, recovery mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria: Database performs efficiently, backups and recovery mechanisms are in place.
test_cases: Given a query is run, when optimized, then performance should be high. Given data is backed up, when data loss occurs, then recovery should be successful.

title: Implement end-to-end security measures
description: As a security officer, I want to ensure end-to-end security, so that all data is protected and compliant with regulations.
attributes_and_rules: Encryption, secure APIs, intrusion detection, recurring vulnerability assessments, data protection policies.
acceptance_criteria: Data is protected by encryption, APIs are secure, vulnerabilities are assessed and mitigated.
test_cases: Given data is at rest, when encrypted, then it should not be accessible without decryption. Given an API, when a vulnerability is detected, then it should be patched.
